walk-75-miles.title: Walk 75 Miles Challenge
walk-75-miles.description: I'm taking on the challenge of walking 75 miles in November to raise money for an important cause close to my heart.
walk-75-miles.fullDescription:
I'm raising money for the British Heart Foundation (BHF) and I'd be so grateful for your support.

I was born in 1984 with Transposition of the Great Arteries which is a form of heart condition that affects 1 in 3000 to 1 in 5000 live births.

In November I am undergoing a pacemaker replacement.

During my recovery and throughout November I am walking 75 miles to raise money and awareness for the BHF

Approximately 7.6 million people in the UK live with heart and circulatory diseases. This includes conditions like coronary heart disease and heart failure, and more than 4 million men and over 3.6 million women are affected.

milestones.description: 75 mile virtual walk from Exeter Royal Hospital to the Bristol Heart Institute

walk-75-miles.whyImDoing: This cause is incredibly important to me because it directly impacts the lives of people including myself. Every pound raised goes towards providing essential support and resources that can truly change lives.
